about_the_game:
RESCUE YOUR SISTER.
  • Save Lyra: Your goal will be to rescue your little sister who has been kidnapped by a religious cult hidden deep within an 18th century American colonial-era fortress.
  • Behold the fortress: Explore the mysterious fortress that is holding your sister and discover all its secrets in order to advance![/list]


    MASSACRE YOUR ENEMIES.
    • Consume blood and survive: Our protagonist has both close and long range abilities, however, these abilities will consume her blood as the player uses them. Choose your strategy wisely to survive waves of enemies that will besiege you during your mission.

    • Unleash the frenzy: Aura has a special ability called Frenzy that will briefly boost her attributes and annihilate her enemies quickly - take advantage of this state!

    • Use the blood pools: The blood puddles mechanic allows Aura to move through the blood spilled by her enemies in addition to making her invulnerable to her enemies. one more advantage on the battlefield!

    • ¡Recupérate vampiro!: As a vampire, Aura has ultra-fast recovery abilities, soak up the blood spilled by your enemies and reach the top of the fortification.


      CHALLENGE YOUR DESTINY.
    • Conquer your demons: Aura lives tormented by the kidnapping of her sister, take back the reins of her destiny and confront her destructive thoughts.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD de 2.5 GHz o más
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything compatible with DirectX 11 o 12
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (Versión 20H2)
  • Processor: Six-Core Xeon E5-2643 @ 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a dark odyssey in 18th century colonial America. Control Aura, a vampire, and rescue her sister Lyra from a religious cult. Use blood-consuming skills and choose your attacks carefully in this 3D third-person top-down action game.
